column5: The international business world is ever changing and challenging. On this course, you’ll develop an understanding of how globalisation shapes business decisions. You’ll gain the confidence to manage organisations and make reliable decisions in an international context. This MSc is for you if you plan to pursue a career in an international enterprise, or wish to understand the complexities of doing business in the contemporary global business environment. Throughout your studies, you’ll:
column7: Find the specific fees for your chosen programme on the website
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
